markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Raven Band](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1507)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armband

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This armband is woven from overlapping raven feathers, including one large feather from a [kadlaka](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1757). As long as you wear it, you understand what ravens are saying, but you can't speak to ravens unless you activate the _raven band_.

<document level="2" id="action-1131" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Raven Band
